Trade/Device Name(s): Audit™M MicroCV™M Therapeutic Drug (TDM) Linearity Set
Specimen Type(s): Human and Bovine serum albumin matrix
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Audit™M MicroCV™M Therapeutic Drug (TDM) Linearity Set, a five-level lyophilized quality control material used for calibration verification of therapeutic drug monitoring methods.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to simulate human patient serum samples for verifying and validating the analytical measurement range of non-waived therapeutic drug testing methods for 14 specified analytes, for proficiency testing, and calibration verification per CLIA-88 guidelines.
